item.title: 美国政府委员会推动曼哈顿计划式的人工智能计划
item.description: 在与中国就先进技术的竞争日益加剧之际，美国国会一个委员会周二提出了一项曼哈顿计划式的倡议，资助开发与人类一样聪明或比人类更聪明的人工智能系统。【原文：A U.S. congressional commission on Tuesday proposed a Manhattan Project-style initiative to fund the development of AI systems that will be as smart or smarter than humans, amid intensifying competition with China over advanced technologies.】

item.title: 随着休闲旅游需求的增长，希尔顿计划扩大在印度的业务范围
item.description: 希尔顿全球亚太区首席执行官表示，希尔顿全球预计在未来五年内将把其在印度的酒店客房数量翻两番，因为在国内旅游市场蓬勃发展的背景下，该酒店运营商正努力缩小与竞争对手的差距。【原文：Hilton Worldwide expects to quadruple the number of hotel rooms in its India pipeline in the next five years, the company's APAC chief said, as the hotel operator seeks to close the gap with rivals amid a booming domestic travel market.】

item.title: COP29 气候谈判：哪些新税种有助于筹集资金应对气候变化？
item.description: 在阿塞拜疆举行的 COP29 气候谈判旨在达成一项每年 1 万亿美元或更多的年度融资目标，以帮助较贫穷的国家应对全球变暖。一些人认为，征收新税是实现这一目标的途径之一。【原文：The COP29 climate talks in Azerbaijan aim to agree an annual finance target of $1 trillion or more a year to help poorer countries respond to global warming. Some see new taxes as one way to get there.】

item.title: 瑞典副首相表示，瑞典没有入股 Northvolt 的计划
item.description: 瑞典能源、商业和工业大臣兼副首相 Ebba Busch 周二告诉路透社，瑞典政府不打算入股电池制造商 Northvolt。【原文：The Swedish government does not plan to take a stake in battery maker Northvolt, Sweden's Minister for Energy, Business and Industry and Deputy Prime Minister Ebba Busch told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 英伟达Run:ai交易将于12月20日前获得欧盟反垄断裁决
item.description: 根据欧盟委员会的一份文件，欧盟反垄断监管机构将在12月20日前就美国芯片制造商英伟达（Nvidia）收购以色列人工智能初创公司Run:ai的提议做出决定。【原文：EU antitrust regulators will make a decision on U.S. chipmaker Nvidia's proposed acquisition of Israeli AI startup Run:ai by Dec. 20, according to a European Commission filing.】

item.title: 医疗保健行业高管预计 2025 年将有更多首次公开募股和企业交易
item.description: 杰富瑞（Jefferies）周二发布的年度医疗报告显示，医疗行业高管和投资者预计2025年首次公开募股和企业交易将有所上升，地缘政治紧张局势将取代资金挑战，成为该行业面临的最大风险。【原文：Healthcare executives and investors expect an uptick in initial public offerings and corporate dealmaking in 2025, with geopolitical tensions overtaking funding challenges as the biggest risk to the sector, Jefferies' annual healthcare report showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: Lyft 将推出骑手验证徽章以促进安全
item.description: Lyft 周二表示，该公司将推出乘客验证徽章等功能，以提高打车平台的安全性。【原文：Lyft is rolling out, among other features, verification badges for riders in a bid to improve safety on the ride-hailing platform, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 路透社任命莎莉-布兹比（Sally Buzbee）为美国和加拿大新闻编辑
item.description: 路透社周二表示，最近担任《华盛顿邮报》执行编辑的莎莉-布兹比将加入路透社，担任美国和加拿大的新闻编辑，监督这家全球通讯社对唐纳德-特朗普第二次担任总统的报道，以及其他优先事项。【原文：Sally Buzbee, most recently the executive editor of the Washington Post, will join Reuters as News Editor for the United States and Canada, overseeing the global news agency’s coverage of a second Donald Trump presidency, among other priorities, Reuters said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国 10 月独户住宅开工率下滑
item.description: 由于飓风 "海伦 "和 "米尔顿 "压制了南部地区的活动，10 月份美国独户住宅的建造量出现下滑。【原文：U.S. single-family homebuilding tumbled in October as Hurricanes Helene and Milton depressed activity in the South and permits rose slightly, suggesting that a rebound was likely to be muted by higher mortgage rates.】

item.title: 微软推出两款数据中心基础架构芯片，加速人工智能应用
item.description: 微软周二在其 Ignite 大会上表示，已为其数据中心设计了两款额外的基础架构芯片，这将有助于加快人工智能的运行速度并提高数据安全性。【原文：Microsoft has designed two additional infrastructure chips for its data centers that will help speed artificial intelligence operations and increase data security, it said on Tuesday at its Ignite conference.】

item.title: 雀巢淡化小肯尼迪的反包装食品言论
item.description: 雀巢公司淡化了当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）选中领导美国最高卫生机构的小罗伯特-肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr.【原文：Nestle has played down concerns about anti-packaged food rhetoric from Robert F. Kennedy Jr., President-elect Donald Trump's pick to lead the United States' top health agency.】

item.title: Robinhood 拟斥资 3 亿美元收购 TradePMR，以加强咨询业务
item.description: 零售交易平台 Robinhood Markets 周二表示，将以现金加股票的方式收购投资组合管理平台 TradePMR，交易价格约为 3 亿美元。【原文：Retail trading platform Robinhood Markets will acquire portfolio management platform TradePMR in a cash-and-stock deal for about $300 million, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 微软支持的初创公司 d-Matrix 推出首款人工智能芯片
item.description: 硅谷初创公司 d-Matrix 周二表示，它正在出货其首款人工智能芯片，旨在提供聊天机器人和视频生成器等服务。【原文：Silicon Valley startup d-Matrix on Tuesday said it is shipping its first AI chip aimed at delivering services such as chatbots and video generators.】

item.title: 医疗器械需求强劲，美敦力上调年度利润预期
item.description: 美敦力公司（Medtronic）第二次上调了其年度利润预期的下限，这主要得益于美国市场对其医疗设备的持续需求，并使其股价在周二的盘前交易中上涨了近 2%。【原文：Medtronic lifted the lower end of its annual profit forecast for a second time, banking on sustained demand for its medical devices in the U.S. and sending its shares up nearly 2% in premarket trading on Tuesday.】

item.title: 开发银行如何未能吸引足够的私人资金投入气候斗争
item.description: 本周，来自世界各地的官员正努力就资助贫困国家应对气候变化问题达成协议，而投资经理罗布-德里科宁恩（Rob Drijkoningen）正是他们希望帮助达成协议的人。【原文：As officials from around the world strive this week to reach a deal on funding for poorer countries to tackle climate change, investment manager Rob Drijkoningen is the sort of person they're hoping will help get them there.】

item.title: Alphabet 与 Anthropic 的人工智能合作不再受英国审查
item.description: 英国竞争监管机构周二表示，根据合并条款，谷歌母公司Alphabet与人工智能初创公司Anthropic之间的合作不符合调查条件。【原文：Britain's competition watchdog said on Tuesday the partnership between Google-parent Alphabet and artificial intelligence startup Anthropic did not qualify for investigation under the merger provisions.】

item.title: Blackstone 达成收购 Jersey Mike's Subs 的协议
item.description: 私募股权投资公司 Blackstone 已同意收购 Jersey Mike's Subs，该三明治连锁店周二表示。【原文：Private equity firm Blackstone has agreed to buy Jersey Mike's Subs, the sandwich chain said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 沃尔玛上调年度预期，押注假日购物旺季
item.description: 沃尔玛周二连续第三次上调了年度销售额和利润预期，人们在网上和沃尔玛门店购买了更多的杂货和商品，这表明沃尔玛可能会在假日季到来之前获得更多的市场份额。【原文：Walmart on Tuesday raised its annual sales and profit forecast for the third consecutive time, with people buying more groceries and merchandise online and at its stores, a sign that it may be gaining market share ahead of the holiday season.】

item.title: 独家报道曼特尔-里奇提名空气产品公司新董事会，力推新任首席执行官
item.description: Mantle Ridge 已提名九名董事替换空气化工产品公司的董事会，这位激进的投资者推动这家工业气体生产商任命新的首席执行官，改变资本分配，并放弃风险较高的项目。【原文：Mantle Ridge has nominated nine directors to replace the board at Air Products and Chemicals , with the activist investor pushing the industrial gases maker to name a new CEO, shift its capital allocation and abandon riskier projects.】

item.title: 无人机制造商 AeroVironment 将以 41 亿美元收购 BlueHalo
item.description: 无人机制造商 AeroVironment 和 BlueHalo 周二表示，两家公司将通过一项全股票交易收购私营航天与国防工程公司 BlueHalo，交易价值约为 41 亿美元。【原文：Drone maker AeroVironment will acquire privately held space and defense engineering company BlueHalo in an all-stock deal valued at about $4.1 billion, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 俄乌紧张局势加剧，华尔街期货下滑
item.description: 由于对俄罗斯和乌克兰之间紧张局势升级的担忧影响了全球风险情绪，投资者纷纷转向避险资产，周二美国股指期货下跌。【原文：U.S. stock index futures fell on Tuesday as worries about escalating tensions between Russia and Ukraine affected risk sentiment globally, with investors rushing to safe-haven assets.】

item.title: 早间竞价：美国国务卿竞选和俄罗斯警告引发国债大涨
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 劳氏公司上调年度同店销售额预期，因风暴后恢复支出增加
item.description: 家居装饰零售商劳氏公司（Lowe's Cos）周二预计全年可比销售额的降幅将低于预期，原因是与飓风有关的需求回升和良好的天气促进了季度销售，尽管大件商品的支出仍然紧张。【原文：Home improvement retailer Lowe's Cos forecast a slower-than-expected drop in annual comparable sales on Tuesday as a pickup in hurricane-related demand and favorable weather boosted quarterly sales, even as big-ticket spending remained strained.】

item.title: 加密世界比特币沉浸在特朗普的光芒中，"欣喜若狂
item.description: 乔-麦凯恩（Joe McCann）坐在迈阿密的公寓里，眼睛紧盯着屏幕上闪烁的比特币交易，因为美国大选的结果已经出来了。【原文：Joe McCann was sitting in his Miami condo, eyes glued to screens flashing with bitcoin trades as the American election results rolled in.】

item.title: 德国警方清理特斯拉千兆工厂抗议现场
item.description: 警方发言人周二表示，反对美国电动汽车制造商特斯拉扩建位于柏林附近格鲁内海德（Grueneheide）的工厂的抗议者营地正在被清理。【原文：A camp of protesters opposed to the expansion of U.S. electric vehicle maker Tesla's plant in Grueneheide near Berlin is being cleared, a police spokesperson said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利为濒临上市的公司员工提供财富管理服务
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）正寻求将初创公司的员工增加为财富管理客户，因为美国投资银行正准备迎接首次公开募股的复兴。【原文：Morgan Stanley is looking to add employees of startup companies as wealth management clients as U.S. investment banks prepare for a revival of initial public offerings.】

item.title: 财报发布后，英伟达期权价格波动达 3000 亿美元
item.description: 美国期权市场数据显示，在本周三英伟达（Nvidia）发布季度财报后，期权交易商已做好准备，迎接该芯片制造商近 3000 亿美元的市值波动。【原文：Options traders are primed for a nearly $300-billion swing in Nvidia's market value following the chipmaker's quarterly results on Wednesday, U.S. options market data showed.】

item.title: NHK 称，Seven & i 创始家族计划今年筹集 520 亿美元进行收购
item.description: 据日本公共广播公司 NHK 周二报道，日本零售商 Seven & I 3382.T 背后的创始人伊藤家族的目标是筹集超过 8 万亿日元（520 亿美元）的资金，以便在本财政年度结束前将其私有化。【原文：The founding Ito family behind Japanese retailer Seven & I 3382.T aims to raise more than 8 trillion yen ($52 billion) to take it private by the end of this financial year, Japanese public broadcaster NHK reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 空中客车公司首席执行官：欧洲航天工业需要整合
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus）首席执行官周二表示，面对美国的私人竞争以及中国和其他国家的投资，欧洲的航天工业需要重组和整合。【原文：The chief executive of Airbus said on Tuesday that Europe's space industry needs to restructure and consolidate in the face of private U.S. competition and investments in China and elsewhere.】

item.title: 瑞士对特朗普提高关税的提议表示担忧
item.description: 瑞士政府周二表示，瑞士对即将上任的美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提高关税的计划表示担忧，并正在考虑如果美国新政府提高贸易壁垒，瑞士将如何应对。【原文：Switzerland has raised concerns about plans by incoming U.S. President Donald Trump to hike tariffs and is considering how to respond should his new administration raise trade barriers, the government said on Tuesday.】
